rules: Rule1: Provided that authorization1 grants manual approval to vehicle1, if it is not the case that vehicle1 is not authorized for substance1 implies authorization1 has emergency override, then vehicle1 has maintenance scheduled

Rule2: When vehicle1 receives automated approval occurs, if the absence of vehicle1 being unauthorized for substance1 leads to authorization1 having emergency override, then vehicle1 has maintenance scheduled
Rule3: Under the condition that vehicle1 is operational, vehicle1 is in routine operation or vehicle1 is authorized for substance1
Rule4: Provided that vehicle1 has adequate fuel, vehicle1 is operational
Rule5: Either vehicle1 has adequate fuel, or vehicle1 has adequate battery
Rule6: Whenever vehicle1's fuel system is okay, then vehicle1 having adequate battery implies vehicle1 is operational
Rule7: Vehicle1's fuel system is okay, or vehicle1's battery system is okay
Rule8: Given that vehicle1's battery system is okay, if vehicle1 has adequate battery, then vehicle1 is operational
Rule9: If a malfunction is detected in vehicle1, then vehicle1 has system failure
Rule10: When vehicle1 has sensor fault occurs, vehicle1 has navigation error
Rule11: If vehicle1 has sensor fault, then vehicle1 does not have position error
Rule12: Provided that vehicle1 has GPS issue, if vehicle1 has navigation error, then vehicle1 has position error
Rule13: If vehicle1 has inertial issue, then vehicle1 having navigation error implies vehicle1 has position error
Rule14: Vehicle1 experiences external interference, or vehicle1 has GPS issue, or vehicle1 has inertial issue
Rule15: If vehicle1 has contamination from substance1, then vehicle1 is contaminated
Rule16: Whenever vehicle1 requires inspection, vehicle1 is inspected
Rule17: Either vehicle1 requires inspection, or vehicle1 is not contaminated
Rule18: Provided that the implication from vehicle1 being approved for substance1 to vehicle1 being authorized for substance1 does not hold, vehicle1 is under review at facility1
Rule19: When it is not the case that either authorization1 grants manual approval to vehicle1 or vehicle1 receives automated approval occurs, vehicle1 has an approval error
Rule20: If authorization1 granting manual approval to vehicle1 or vehicle1 receiving automated approval does not hold, then vehicle1 does not have an approval error
Rule21: Under the condition that a malfunction being detected in vehicle1 implying no system failure in vehicle1 is false, vehicle1 has sensor fault
Rule22: Provided that vehicle1 being under review at facility1 leading to denied access to facility1 is not true, vehicle1 has contamination from substance1
Rule23: When vehicle1 not being authorized for substance1 implying authorization1 has emergency override does not hold, vehicle1 does not have maintenance scheduled
Rule24: If vehicle1 is not operational, then a malfunction is detected in vehicle1
Rule25: Under the condition that vehicle1 is not authorized for substance1, authorization1 does not have emergency override
facts: Fact1: Vehicle1 is approved for substance1
Fact2: It is not the case that vehicle1 is in routine operation
Fact3: Vehicle1 is not denied access to facility1
Fact4: Vehicle1 does not experience external interference
